授業方法:
2022 UPDATE: All classes are expected to be conducted on campus, face-to-face style. Google Classroom will be used for some course information and assignment submissions, and, also for any outside of class contact with the teacher. This course is centered mainly on discussions based on the project and topic information. This class requires interactive English only discussions with classmates every lesson.
*If the pandemic worsens and classes need to be conducted online, all lessons will be done live using Zoom. The teacher will post updated information in LUNA and all students will be contacted individually by their KGU e-mail addresses to explain about online classes if on campus face-to-face classes are not possible in the Fall 2022 semester. Students who have completed the necessary documents and have been accepted by the university to take online classes instead of Face-to-Face classes must attend all classes live on Zoom. The teacher will contact students directly and give them the Zoom links through student KGU e-mail addresses. ONLY students who have permission from KGU to take online classes can use Zoom for the lessons, all other students need to attend classes regularly.

Email the teacher at mjchang@kwansei.ac.jp to get the Google Classroom site code to register.

**If classes are to be held online, all classes will be live using Zoom for synchronous style classes.
------
This is an all-English classroom. Students can expect to communicate with the teacher and other students in English only. Assignments may require the use of a computer and online sites.

Additionally, this class is taught communicatively and the class functions as a community in which all members support each other. This means that students can expect to interact regularly through pair work or small groups to review course content and/or will have consistent interaction with the teacher.
